translations: 轻信的；因轻信而产生的

sentences.sentence: Credulous people are easily misled by false advertisements.
sentences.translation: 轻信的人很容易上虚假广告的当。

sentences.sentence: He has suffered several times because he is credulous.
sentences.translation: 他太轻信，吃了好几次苦头。

sentences.sentence: The manager of the bank was credulous individual named Mr. Fish.
sentences.translation: 银行经理称“鱼先生，”是个轻信的人。
